reviewText: Love this series was sorry to see that it had so few seasons. Good characters and plots.
A great series. Too bad there are not many more seasons.

The description for this series sounded so good, and is a genre I favor, so I bought Series 1 and Series 2. I didn't care for it at all. I think the Swedish version of Wallander with Krister Henricksson is SO good that it ruined me for anything less.
I returned both series of The Protectors. No point in keeping it.
So disappointed Netflix dropped it from instant view. One of the best TV series ever created. I wish Amazon had it in US format.

A GREAT SERIES

too bad it ended
maybe they will continue it in the future
should also be region 1 also
